body.title: Get Started with OpenObserve
body.description: Choose the deployment option that best fits your needs and start monitoring your applications today.

tabs.label: Cloud
tabs.title: OpenObserve Clouds
tabs.description: Get started in minutes with our fully managed cloud solution. No infrastructure to manage.
features: Scalable resources based on your needs

subTabs.label: Quick Start
subTabs.title: Quick Start Installation
subTabs.description:
Get up and running quickly with our Docker-based installation.

docker run -d \ --name openobserve \ -p 5080:5080 \ -e ZO_ROOT_USER_EMAIL=root@example.com \ -e ZO_ROOT_USER_PASSWORD=complexpass#123 \ openobserve/openobserve:latest


For more installation options, check our documentation.

seo.title: OpenObserve - Modern Observability for Modern Apps
seo.description: OpenObserve is an open-source observability platform designed for modern applications, providing powerful visibility at a fraction of the cost.
